description: This table contains the values used by contract pricing extensions for calculating expected reimbursement.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: COST_OUT_PMT_TOTAL
columns.description: This column stores the outlier payment amount for the claim for use in claims printing. This is used for inpatient claims sent to the Health Authority of Abu Dhabi that are paid by diagnosis-related group (DRG).

columns.name: COST_OUT_PMT_CAND
columns.description: The cost outlier payment total for a claim that does not include a cost outlier in its expected reimbursement amount calculation but that may be a candidate for a cost outlier.

columns.name: IMPLANT_PMT_TOTAL
columns.description: This item tracks the expected reimbursement for implants.  This data must be stored using a contracts pricing programming point that specifically updates this item.

columns.name: PHY_TRANS_PMT_TOTAL
columns.description: The expected reimbursement for physician transplant.

columns.name: COST_OUT_TAX_TOTAL
columns.description: For inpatient claims sent to the Health Authority of Abu Dhabi that are paid by DRG, this item will hold the VAT amount calculated for the Cost Outlier Payment Total for use in claims printing. This item can be used in other, mutually exclusive scenarios for expected reimbursement calculations.

columns.name: ADD_ON_TAX_TOTAL
columns.description: For inpatient claims sent to the Health Authority of Abu Dhabi that are paid by DRG, this item will hold the add-on VAT amount for the claim for use in claims printing. This item can be used in other, mutually exclusive scenarios for expected reimbursement calculations.

columns.name: SUPPLY_ADD_ON_PMT_TOTAL
columns.description: For inpatient claims sent to the Dubai Health Authority that are paid by DRG, this item will hold the high cost supply add-on payment amount for the claim for use in claims printing. This item can be used in other, mutually exclusive scenarios for expected reimbursement calculations. The value and specific purpose for this item may change based on the extension used.

columns.name: DRUG_ADD_ON_PMT_TOTAL
columns.description: For inpatient claims sent to the Dubai Health Authority that are paid by DRG, this item will hold the high cost drug add-on payment amount for the claim for use in claims printing. This item can be used in other, mutually exclusive scenarios for expected reimbursement calculations. The value and specific purpose for this item may change based on the extension used.
